thread.title: Even Harvard is getting in on the Back to the Future fun - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Even Harvard is getting in on the Back to the Future fun - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Even Harvard is getting in on the Back to the Future fun - Massachusetts news
text:
October 21, 2015—better known as “today”—is the “future” Marty McFly travels to in “Back to the Future Part II,” and as a head nod to the classic movie, Harvard University posted this tweet:
Dunster House clock tower salutes, #BackToTheFuture fans. pic.twitter.com/vZwItRILjf
— Harvard University (@Harvard) October 21, 2015 Related Links Go Back to the Future (II) and watch this mock trailer for Jaws 19 Get today’s headlines right in your inbox
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The clockface will be stuck at 10:04 for the day, in reference to the time at which lightning struck the Hill Valley Courthouse clocktower in the original movie.
May it stand for all time!
